languages.text: "Без оков ложного бога я наконец-то смогла создать чертеж машины, порожденной работой моего ума. Могла ли я помыслить о таком, все еще пребывая в тенетах Омниссии?"

"Free from the shackles of the false god, I was finally able to create the blueprint for a machine that stemmed from my mind's eye. Could I even have thought of such a thing while I was still caught in the Omnissiah's web?"
languages.original_text: "Без оков ложного бога я наконец-то смогла создать чертеж машины, порожденной работой моего ума. Могла ли я помыслить о таком, все еще пребывая в тенетах Омниссии?"

traits.locale_text: "Free from the shackles of the false god, I finally could create the blueprint for a machine that stemmed from my mind's eye. Would I even think about it while covering in the Omnissiah's shadow?"
"Free from the shackles of the false god, I finally could create the blueprint for a machine that stemmed from my mind's eye. Would I even think about it while covering in the Omnissiah's shadow?"

"Free from the shackles of the false god, I was finally able to create the blueprint for a machine that stemmed from my mind's eye. Could I even have thought of such a thing while I was still caught in the Omnissiah's web?"

"Free from the shackles of the false god, I was finally able to create the blueprint for a machine that stemmed from my mind's eye. Could I even have thought of such a thing while I was still caught in the Omnissiah's web?"

"Free from the shackles of the false god, I was finally able to create the blueprint for a machine that stemmed from my mind's eye. Could I even have thought of such a thing while I was still caught in the Omnissiah's web?"

languages.text: “我摆脱了伪神的桎梏，终于得以创造出源于我心中的机器蓝图。当我还被困在欧姆尼塞亚的巨网中时，像这样的事情，恐怕我连想都不敢想吧？”
languages.original_text: "Free from the shackles of the false god, I was finally able to create the blueprint for a machine that stemmed from my mind's eye. Could I even have thought of such a thing while I was still caught in the Omnissiah's web?"

traits.locale_text: “我摆脱了伪神的桎梏，终于得以创造出源于我心中的机器蓝图。当我还被困在欧姆尼塞亚的巨网中时，像这样的事情，恐怕我连想都不敢想吧？”

languages.text: «Libre de los grilletes del falso dios, por fin pude crear los planos de una máquina que apareció en el ojo de mi mente. ¿Podría haber ideado semejante artefacto cuando estaba atrapado en la telaraña del Omnissiah?».
languages.original_text: "Free from the shackles of the false god, I was finally able to create the blueprint for a machine that stemmed from my mind's eye. Could I even have thought of such a thing while I was still caught in the Omnissiah's web?"

traits.locale_text: «Libre de los grilletes del falso dios, por fin pude crear los planos de una máquina que apareció en el ojo de mi mente. ¿Podría haber ideado semejante artefacto cuando estaba atrapado en la telaraña del Omnissiah?».

languages.text: 「偽の神の手から逃れて、やっと心の目で見た機械の設計図を作ることができる。万機神がめぐらせた糸で身動きが取れずにいたときには、そんなことを考えられただろうか？」
languages.original_text: "Free from the shackles of the false god, I was finally able to create the blueprint for a machine that stemmed from my mind's eye. Could I even have thought of such a thing while I was still caught in the Omnissiah's web?"

traits.locale_text: 「偽の神の手から逃れて、やっと心の目で見た機械の設計図を作ることができる。万機神がめぐらせた糸で身動きが取れずにいたときには、そんなことを考えられただろうか？」

languages.text: "Befreit von den Fesseln des falschen Gottes, konnte ich endlich den Bauplan für eine Maschine erstellen, die meinem geistigen Auge entstammte. Wäre mir so etwas jemals eingefallen, als ich noch im Netz des Omnissiah gefangen war?"
languages.original_text: "Free from the shackles of the false god, I was finally able to create the blueprint for a machine that stemmed from my mind's eye. Could I even have thought of such a thing while I was still caught in the Omnissiah's web?"

traits.locale_text: "Befreit von den Fesseln des falschen Gottes, konnte ich endlich den Bauplan für eine Maschine erstellen, die meinem geistigen Auge entstammte. Wäre mir so etwas jemals eingefallen, als ich noch im Netz des Omnissiah gefangen war?"

languages.text: « Délivrée des chaînes du faux dieu, j'ai enfin pu créer le plan d'une machine qui a pris naissance dans mon esprit. Aurais-je pu ne serait-ce qu'imaginer une telle chose sous l'influence de l'Omnimessie ? »
languages.original_text: "Free from the shackles of the false god, I was finally able to create the blueprint for a machine that stemmed from my mind's eye. Could I even have thought of such a thing while I was still caught in the Omnissiah's web?"

traits.locale_text: « Délivrée des chaînes du faux dieu, j'ai enfin pu créer le plan d'une machine qui a pris naissance dans mon esprit. Aurais-je pu ne serait-ce qu'imaginer une telle chose sous l'influence de l'Omnimessie ? »

languages.text: "Sahte tanrının zincirlerinden kurtulup akıl gözüyle gördüğüm bu makinenin şablonunu yaratmayı başardım. Hermesih'in ağında sıkışıp kalmaya devam etseydim... Böyle bir şeyi hayal edebilir miydim?"
languages.original_text: "Free from the shackles of the false god, I was finally able to create the blueprint for a machine that stemmed from my mind's eye. Could I even have thought of such a thing while I was still caught in the Omnissiah's web?"

traits.locale_text: "Sahte tanrının zincirlerinden kurtuldum ve akıl gözüyle gördüğüm bu makinenin şablonunu yaratmayı başardım. Hermesih'in ağında sıkışıp kalmaya devam etseydim… Böyle bir şeyi hayal edebilir miydim?"
